name: Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel
description: Situated in Florianópolis, Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel is located on the oceanfront of Praia dos Ingleses, in Santa Catarina. It offers a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool, and an indoor pool. All are equipped with air conditioning, free WiFi, minibar, hairdryer, telephone, safety deposit box and flat-screen TV. At lunch and dinner times, the restaurant offers regional and international food as well as a special menu for children for a surcharge. At the 4-star Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel, guests can take advantage of a tennis court, games room, gym, and soccer, volleyball and basketball courts. A TV lounge, sauna, hot tub and spa treatments are also provided. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 21 km from the accommodation, while Campeche Island is 28 km away. The International Airport is about 39 km away from property.

name: Villas Jurerê Hotel Boutique
description: Villas Jurerê Hotel Boutique is situated at the north corner of Florianópolis, just 50 metres away from Jurerê beach, and features a sauna and a rich breakfast buffet All rooms are air-conditioned and offer a balcony. Each guest room has its own unique colour and is equipped with a ceiling fan and a cable TV. Guests can also make use of a microwave and a minibar. Villas Jurerê Hotel Boutique features free WiFi, 24-hour front desk and 4-wheel bikes available upon request due to availability. Guided vineyard tours and massage services may also be arranged at the property. The property is located less than 35 km away from Hercílio Luz International Airport. Free on-site parking is possible.

name: Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras
description: Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras is situated in the Canasvieiras district of Florianópolis, 19 km from Floripa Mall, 24 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall and 37 km from Campeche Island. The accommodation is 12 km from Casa Açoriana Handcraft, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site. The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Waterpark Água Show is 7 km from the apartment, while Praia dos Ingleses is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 27 km from Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras.

name: Hotel São Sebastião da Praia
description: Just 500 metres from Campeche Beach, Hotel São Sebastião da Praia offers spacious chalets. Surrounded by the Atlantic Forest, it features an outdoor thermal pool, an indoor pool and a playground. Extras include barbecue facilities for a surcharge. WiFi is free. The chalets at the Hotel São Sebastião feature attractive brickwork interiors and private balconies with scenic garden views. All are equipped with air conditioning, TV and a minibar. Guests at the Hotel São Sebastião da Praia can enjoy a daily breakfast buffet with fresh fruits, juices and pastries. Hot water for the Chimarrão drink is also offered. The hotel is conveniently located only 16 km from Hercilio Luz Airport. Free private parking is provided.

name: Pousada Ilha Faceira
description: No description found

name: ApartHotel no Jurerê Beach Village
description: Located in Florianópolis, this welcoming apartment lets you experience it all. Jurere Beach is just a short walk away, so you can leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking, or jump in your vehicle to make short work of the 3-minute drive to Jurerê Open Shopping. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the outdoor pool, or sip a drink on the balcony of this apartment, which also features a fitness center. As for the great indoors, you can try your hand at billiards, or enjoy the free WiFi and LED TV. This vacation rental features luggage storage, air conditioning, a roundtrip airport shuttle, and tour/ticket assistance. The kitchen is equipped with an espresso maker, a microwave, and cookware. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Pietra Flat
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace and beach service, Flat Pietra provides spacious accommodation on the sands of Praia dos Ingleses Beach. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar or relax in the hot tub on site. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms feature sea views and flat-screen TVs with cable channels. They also have a kitchenette with a microwave, refrigerator and stove. The bathrooms come with a hot shower. The staff a Pietra is available 24h. They can also arrange boat and sightseeing tours, as well as shuttle service. Central Bairro dos Ingleses is 1 km from Flat Pietra, with various dining and shopping options. Florianópolis centre is 20 km away. You can get to Hercílio Luz Airport in 50 minutes by car.

name: Residencial Sol e Mar de Floripa
description: No description found

name: Hotel Porto Sol Beach
address: Rua Das Buganvilias, 123 Praia Cachoeira de Bom Jesus, Florianopolis 88056-025
description: Boasting an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Porto Sol Beach is on the beachfront and offers comfortable accommodation in Florianópolis. It features a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and organising tours for guests. All rooms at Hotel Porto Sol Beach feature a cable TV, air conditioning, a seating area and a modern, en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a balcony with a sea view. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Porto Sol Beach offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at the hotel. Praia de Canasvieiras is 350 metres from Hotel Porto Sol Beach, while Pontas das Canas Beach is 2.3 km away.

name: Ingleses Paradise
description: Paradise is a beachfront property located in Florianópolis, a few steps from Ingleses Beach and 1.8 km from Santinho Beach. Private parking is available on site at this recently renovated property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. Each unit comes with a balcony, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. At the aparthotel, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel. Floripa Mall is 24 km from Paradise, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International, 39 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras
description: Set in Florianópolis, within 60 metres of Praia de Canasvieiras and 800 metres of Praia da Cachoeira do Bom Jesus, Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras offers accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Some rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a minibar and a stovetop. An American breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. You can play billiards at Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras, and the area is popular for hiking and fishing. Canajure Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Floripa Mall is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International, 34 km from Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pousada Ilha da Magia
address: Av. Pref. Acacio Garibaldi Santiago, 23, Florianopolis 88062-600
description: These well-equipped, charming chalets are right by Conceição Lagoon, in Florianópolis. Amenities at Pousada Ilha da Magia include 2 panoramic pools and exuberant gardens, plus free Wi-Fi and free parking. The chalets offer differentiated décor, with nice colour schemes. Equipped with flat-screen TV with cable channels and hot and cold air conditioning, they also have a dining area with a minibar, microwave and sandwhich maker. Guests at Pousada Ilha da Magia can enjoy a BBQ and relax in the garden. Ilha da Magia provides a tour desk for local excursions and shuttle service to the airport, bus station, and rental car service. Guests can rent kayaks, stand up paddle boards, and kite surf equipment in front of the property. The pousada is located 800 metres from Mole Beach and 2 km from Joaquina Beach. Florianópolis Cathedral is 17 km away.

name: Il Campanário Jurerê Internacional - Studio
description: Situated in Florianópolis, 200 metres from Jurere Beach, Il Campanário Jurerê Internacional - Studio features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and children's playground. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hot tub, bathrobes and a hairdryer. At Il Campanário Jurerê rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a terrace. Praia do Forte is 1.9 km from Il Campanário Jurerê Internacional - Studio, while Jurerê Tradicional is 1.9 km from the property.

name: Ingleses Park Hotel
description: Located in the Ingleses district in Florianópolis, 30 metres from the beach, Ingleses Park Hotel features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Free private parking is available on site. The rooms have a TV and a private bathroom. There is room service at the property. Car hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for diving and hiking. Floripa Mall is 17 km from Ingleses Park Hotel, while Joaquina Beach is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 29 km from Ingleses Park Hotel.

name: Resort pé na areia - Studios direto com proprietário JBVJR
description: Boasting a bar, Resort pé na areia - Studios direto com proprietário JBVJR is set in Florianópolis in the Santa Catarina Island region, 200 metres from Jurere Beach and less than 1 km from Jurerê Tradicional. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms at the property feature a balcony with a sea view. The rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a TV, and some units at the resort have a terrace. At Resort pé na areia - Studios direto com proprietário JBVJR every room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Canajure Beach is 2.2 km from Resort pé na areia - Studios direto com proprietário JBVJR, while Praia de Canasvieiras is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 32 km from the resort.

name: Pousada Estação Sol e Lua
description: No description found

name: Gentil Hotel
description: Gentil Hotel offers a swimming pool, and air-conditioned rooms only 50 metres from Praia dos Ingleses Beach in Florianópolis. There is free WiFi in public areas and private parking. The rooms at Gentil Hotel are simply decorated with tiled floors, a ceiling fan and ample wardrobe. In addition to air conditioning, they have a minibar, TV and private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Gentil Hotel is within a few steps of dining and shopping options. Oceania events venue is 3 km away. The property is 10 km from famous Jurerê Internacional Beach and 5 km from Costão do Santinho. Hercílio Luz Airport is 45 km away.

name: Chácara Rio Jordão
address: Rua Dário Manoel Cardoso, nº 2222, Florianopolis 88058-400
description: No description found

name: Cobertura com cozinha dentro de resort - Direto com proprietário ILCTOPM
description: Featuring a bar, Cobertura com cozinha dentro de resort - Direto com proprietário ILCTOPM is set in Florianópolis in the Santa Catarina Island region, 400 metres from Jurere Beach and 2.3 km from Jurerê Tradicional. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms at the property feature a balcony with a sea view. At the resort, the rooms have a wardrobe. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a TV, and certain units at Cobertura com cozinha dentro de resort - Direto com proprietário ILCTOPM have a terrace. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Cobertura com cozinha dentro de resort - Direto com proprietário ILCTOPM offers a children's playground. Praia do Forte is 2.4 km from the resort, while Floripa Mall is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 31 km from Cobertura com cozinha dentro de resort - Direto com proprietário ILCTOPM.

name: Studio Dentro De Hotel - Seazone Ilcjr
description: Set in Florianópolis and with Jurere Beach reachable within 300 metres, Studio dentro de hotel - Seazone ILCJR offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 2.3 km from Jurerê Tradicional, 2.4 km from Praia do Forte and 16 km from Floripa Mall. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the resort, rooms have a wardrobe. All rooms come with air conditioning, a desk and a TV, and certain units at Studio dentro de hotel - Seazone ILCJR have a terrace. The units will provide guests with a fridge. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 21 km from Studio dentro de hotel - Seazone ILCJR, while Campeche Island is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 32 km from the resort.

name: Suite com cozinha dentro de hotel - Seazone ILCTOP
description: Featuring a bar, Suite com cozinha dentro de hotel - Seazone ILCTOP is located in Florianópolis in the Santa Catarina Island region, 300 metres from Jurere Beach and 2.4 km from Praia do Forte. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain units at the property include a balcony with a sea view. Each room has air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a TV, and certain rooms at the resort have a terrace. At Suite com cozinha dentro de hotel - Seazone ILCTOP each room comes with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Jurerê Tradicional is 2.5 km from Suite com cozinha dentro de hotel - Seazone ILCTOP, while Floripa Mall is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 32 km from the resort.

name: Cobertura luxuosa dentro de Resort - Direto com proprietário
address: 1760 Avenida dos Búzios, Governador Celso Ramos 88053-301
description: Located in Florianópolis, 200 metres from Jurere Beach, Cobertura luxuosa dentro de Resort - Direto com proprietário provides air-conditioned rooms and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Local points of interest like Casa Açoriana Handcraft and Floripa Mall are reachable within 10 km and 16 km, respectively. At the resort, every room comes with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms here will provide you with a terrace and others also provide guests with sea views. All units will provide guests with a microwave. Cobertura luxuosa dentro de Resort offers a children's playground. Praia do Forte is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Jurerê Tradicional is 1.9 km away.

name: Ondina Apart Hotel - Apto. 537
description: Comfortable and very cozy apartment, all thought with great care so that our guests really feel at home!!! The space has air conditioning in the living room and bedroom, very well equipped kitchen, wi-fi. We provide bed linen (sheets 300 thread count) and bath linen (100% cotton) for our guests. The accommodation has maid service daily (at no extra cost) and a covered parking space (free of charge). The Ondina Apart Hotel has an excellent structure: 24 hour reception, adult / child pool, sauna, bar / pool service, court and playground. In addition to all these facilities, it also has a restaurant, beauty salon, laundry and gym for guests (with additional cost). With an excellent location, close to one of the most beautiful postcards of Salvador: Farol da Barra!!! Restaurants, shopping, Theater, Zoo, Church, Cafeteria, Pizzeria, Pharmacy and much more, all very close to our apartment. It is worth adding that the Ondina Apart Hotel is located on the Orla de Salvador, by the sea, on the beach of Ondina! Comfort and convenience are our differential!!!VRBO

name: Mercure Sao Paulo Vila Olimpia
address: Rua Santa Justina 210, Vila Olimpia, Sao Paulo
description: Mercure São Paulo Vila Olímpia offers an authentic experience for your business or leisure stay. Spacious rooms for couples, singles and families, with view, A/C, and free WIFI. Event rooms, pool, sauna, and gym. Some rooms have been converted into offices. The cozy La Forchetta outdoor restaurant includes a vegetable garden for Italian and Brazilian dishes. Enjoy our great wine menu at the bar area.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Colonial Iguaçu
address: Rod. Das Cataratas, Km 20, Foz do Iguaçu 85855-750
description: Boasting indoor and outdoor pools, Hotel Colonial Iguaçu offers accommodation in Foz do Iguaçu, only a few minutes walking from the National Park and the renowned waterfalls in Foz do Iguaçu. Free WiFi is offered in public areas and free private parking is available on site. The comfortable rooms at Hotel Colonial Iguaçu feature air conditioning and a private bathroom. Superior categories also offer cable TV. The hotel also features a playground, games room, gym and barbecuing facilities. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks.

name: Dom Pedro I Palace Hotel
address: Rodovia das Cataratas - Km 3, Foz do Iguaçu
description: Situated on Cataratas Avenue, the Dom Pedro I Palace Hotel is just 3 km from Foz de Iguaçu´s city centre. Facilities include 3 swimming pools, a bar, shared lounge, garden, a restaurant, as well as a fitness centre. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests. Free WiFi is available throughout, as well as free parking. All air-conditioned rooms at Dom Pedro I feature minibar, desk, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. The accommodation offers a buffet or American breakfast. Palace Hotel features a variety of leisure facilities including tennis courts, sauna, a childrens' playground and a football field. There is a outdoor pool for adults, a heated pool and a kids' pool with a playground. Guests can also take advantage of the business centre. Garganta del Diablo is 19 km from Dom Pedro I Palace Hotel, while Country Club is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Aguas do Iguacu Hotel
address: Avenida Brasil, 84 - Centro, Foz do Iguaçu 85852-090
description: This hotel in Foz do Iguaçu centre is only 300 metres from the main public transportation hub, which offers easy access to Iguaçu Falls, restaurants and shops. The property features a pool and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms at Águas do Iguaçu Hotel Centro are bright and spacious, providing minibar, cable TV and telephone. Guests enjoy a regional specialties buffet, featuring a variety of regional delicacies such as cheeses, breads, fruits and hot meals. Breakfast can also be served in the room, for an extra fee. Guests at Águas do Iguaçu Hotel can enjoy a free transfer service from the airport to the hotel from 8:00 to 18:00, provided that you book this service 48 hours in advance, as well as other services such as a tour desk and luggage storage.

name: Cataratas Park Hotel e Eventos
address: Av. das Cataratas, 6075, Foz do Iguaçu 85853-000
description: Featuring free WiFi, Cataratas Park Hotel e Eventos offers accommodation in Foz do Iguaçu. Private parking is also available on site for a surcharge. The rooms are bright fitted with air conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast with croissants, fresh fruits and pastries. At Cataratas Park Hotel e Eventos, a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge and gift shop are also available. Guests can enjoy a running track, a children playground, an outdoor hot tub, a heated swimming pool and a garden. Bird Park is 6 km from Cataratas Park Hotel e Eventos, while Iguaçu National Park is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguaçu Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Del Rey Quality Hotel
description: Featuring a panoramic heated pool and a games room, Del Rey Quality Hotel is 100 metres from Foz do Iguaçu city centre, just a 30-minute drive from the Iguaçu Falls. WiFi and parking are free. With local paintings on the walls, rooms display neutral colours, providing cable TV, minibar, telephone and air conditioning. For guests' convenience, Del Rey Quality Hotel offers room service. A rich colonial buffet breakfast with dozens of items is served in the spacious restaurant, including homemade delicacies. Del Rey Quality Hotel is 200 metres from the local Bus Station and within walking distance of shops and restaurants. Bosque Guarani Zoo is 200 metres from the property, and Cataratas JL Shopping Mall is 1.5 km away. Foz do Iguaçu International Airport is a 16 km away, and airport shuttle service is available upon request and for a surcharge.

name: Villaggio dos Pássaros
address: Núcleo Rural Desembargador Colombo Cerqueira - Paranoá Chácara 380, Paranoá 71589-899
description: Set in Paranoá, within 17 km of Iguatemi Shopping and 19 km of Supreme Court of Justice of Brazil, Villaggio dos Pássaros offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. Guests can make use of the sun terrace or the children's playground, or enjoy views of the pool and garden. At the guest house every room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. At Villaggio dos Pássaros all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Spa and wellness facilities including a sauna, a hot tub and a hammam are at guests' disposal during their stay at the accommodation. You can play darts at Villaggio dos Pássaros, and the area is popular for walking tours. Square of the Three Powers is 19 km from the guest house, while Brasília Cathedral is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 33 km from Villaggio dos Pássaros.

name: The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível
address: Shtn Trecho 2 lote 4 - Asa Norte, Brasília - DF, Brasil, Brasilia 70800-220
description: Situated in Brasilia, 4 km from Palace of Justice, The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation offers a kids' club and a 24-hour front desk for guests. All rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer. At The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível the rooms include bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a hot spring bath. National Congress of Brazil is 4.8 km from The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível, while Brasília Cathedral is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 22 km from the resort.

name: Saint Tropez Praia Hotel
description: Located on Parracho Beach in Arraial D'ajuda, Porto Seguro, this 4-star hotel has rooms with a balcony and garden views. It also has a terrace with views of the sea. The charming and colorful rooms at the Saint Tropez Praia Hotel feature a TV, a private bathroom and a spacious balcony where guests can enjoy drinks. The Saint Tropez has an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by a lush garden. It also has a sauna and a massage room, where guests can enjoy a range of relaxing treatments. The hotel offers free private parking and free WiFi. You can play tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Pitinga Beach is 1.2 km from Saint Tropez Praia Hotel, while Eco Park is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Porto Seguro Airport, 7 km from Saint Tropez Praia Hotel.

name: Bomtempo Itaipava by Castelo Itaipava
description: Located in Itaipava, 27 km from Petrópolis, Bomtempo Resort features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. There is a restaurant and bar and guests can have fun at the games room. Free private parking is available on site. Every room includes a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area where you can relax. Each room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and free toiletries. Superior rooms have a spa bath or a hot tub. You will find a 24-hour front desk, hairdresser's, and gift shop at the property. You can play tennis and table tennis at this resort, and the area is popular for fishing. Teresópolis is 20 km from Bomtempo Resort, while Itaipava is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 84 km from Bomtempo Resort.

name: Camboriú Praia Hotel
description: Camboriú Praia Hotel is 60 metres from Balneário Camboriú’s beachfront, featuring an indoor pool and a sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Private parking is available for a surcharge. The air conditioned rooms at Camboriú Praia Hotel boast white interiors, with tiled floors and comfortable beds all equipped with a minibar, a TV and private bathroom. A daily breakfast buffet with seasonal fruits, natural juices are available. Guests can enjoy international cuisine at the restaurant, and have refreshing drinks at the bar. Due to its ideal location, the hotel is within 1 km from several fresh seafood restaurants and bars. Other facilities at the hotel include a fitness centre, and games room. The front desk is available 24 hours a day. This hotel is 37 km from Navegantes Airport, and 78 km from Hercilio Luz Airport.

name: Velinn Caravela Pousada Ilhabela
address: Rua Carlos Rizzini, 70 - Barra Velha, Ilhabela 11630-000
description: No description found

name: Hotel La Foret & Beach Club
address: Rua 11 Quadra G Lotes 39 East 40, Búzios
description: Located 400 metres from Joao Fernandes Beach, Hotel La Forêt & Beach Club features 2 swimming pools and a pool bar. Guests also enjoy access to an exclusive beach leisure area at Club La Plage, 400 metres away. Each room is air-conditioned. Accommodation at Hotel La Forêt & Beach Club includes a private bathroom and a balcony with a hammock. The hotel’s tour desk can offer advice on excursions. Guests can enjoy a sauna or a massage session at Club La Plage´s spa. The club features a submerged bar, a fitness area, a beauty parlour and a beachfront restaurant with a variety of dishes. Breakfast is offered at La Foret’s restaurant. The hotel’s pool bar serves drinks and snacks.
